Setting.Name: CustomerFrontend::Module###RequestCustomerTicketMessage
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###002-Request
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###NextScreenAfterNewTicket
Setting.Description: Determines the next screen after new customer ticket in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###Priority
Setting.Description: Allows customers to set the ticket priority in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###PriorityDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default priority of new customer tickets in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###Queue
Setting.Description: Allows customers to set the ticket queue in the customer interface. If this is not enabled, QueueDefault should be configured.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###QueueDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default queue for new customer tickets in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###Service
Setting.Description: Allows customers to set the ticket service in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###SLA
Setting.Description: Allows customers to set the ticket SLA in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###ServiceMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if service must be selected by the customer.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###SLAMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if SLA must be selected by the customer.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###StateDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default state of new customer tickets in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###SenderType
Setting.Description: Sender type for new tickets from the customer inteface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###HistoryType
Setting.Description: Defines the default history type in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###HistoryComment
Setting.Description: Comment for new history entries in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestCustomerTicketMessage###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the ticket overview screen of the customer interface.

Setting.Name: CustomerFrontend::Module###RequestCustomerTicketMessageBlock
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::RequestCustomerTicketMessageBlock###002-Request
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: CustomerFrontend::Module###CustomerRequestOverview
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the customer interface.

Setting.Name: CustomerFrontend::Navigation###CustomerRequestOverview###002-Request
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::CustomerRequestOverviewSortable
Setting.Description: Controls if customers have the ability to sort their requests.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::CustomerRequestOverview###ColumnHeader
Setting.Description: Shows either the last customer article's subject or the ticket title in the small format overview.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::CustomerRequestOverview###Owner
Setting.Description: Show the current owner in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::CustomerRequestOverview###Queue
Setting.Description: Show the current queue in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::CustomerRequestOverview###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the ticket overview screen of the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::RequestIcon
Setting.Description: Allows request icon.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::NewTicketMask
Setting.Description: Allows New Ticket mask.

Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Description: Admin area navigation for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: System::Customer::RequestPermission
Setting.Description: Standard available permissions for customer within the application.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentCustomerRequest
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AgentCustomerRequest###002-Ticket
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Navigation###AgentCustomerRequest###002-Ticket
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketRequest
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AgentTicketRequest###002-Ticket
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketRequest###Priority
Setting.Description: Sets the default priority for new phone tickets in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketRequest###SenderType
Setting.Description: Sets the default sender type for new phone ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketRequest###IsVisibleForCustomer
Setting.Description: Sets the default article customer visibility for new phone tickets in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketRequest::CustomerIDReadOnly
Setting.Description: Controls if CustomerID is read-only in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketRequest::AllowMultipleFrom
Setting.Description: Controls if more than one from entry can be set in the new phone ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketRequest###Subject
Setting.Description: Sets the default subject for new phone tickets (e.g. 'Phone call') in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketRequest###Body
Setting.Description: Sets the default note text for new telephone tickets. E.g 'New ticket via call' in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketRequest###StateDefault
Setting.Description: Sets the default next state for new phone tickets in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketRequest###StateType
Setting.Description: Determines the next possible ticket states, after the creation of a new phone ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketRequest###HistoryType
Setting.Description: Defines the history type for the phone ticket screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketRequest###HistoryComment
Setting.Description: Defines the history comment for the phone ticket screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketRequest###SplitLinkType
Setting.Description: Sets the default link type of splitted tickets in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketRequest###ServiceMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if service must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketRequest###SLAMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if SLA must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketRequestBlock
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AgentTicketRequestBlock###002-Ticket
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.
